AGB: Usage: The app is intended solely for private diary entries. Commercial use is not allowed.
Data: All content is stored locally on your device. The security of your data depends on your device. We recommend regular backups. Content is not stored on any server or in the cloud.
Liability: The developer is not liable for data loss, damages, or other disadvantages, except in cases of gross negligence or intent.
Changes: App features may be modified or removed at any time. Possible impacts on your data will be communicated to the best of our knowledge.
Rights: All rights to the app remain with the developer. Your diary content belongs to you and can be exported or backed up. Copying or distributing the app itself is not allowed.
Termination: Deleting the app will remove all locally stored data. Make sure to back up any content you wish to keep.
Contact & Legal: For questions or legal concerns, contact: contact.oneminutediary@gmail.com

lines: Usage: The app is intended solely for private diary entries. Commercial use is not permitted.
Data: All content is stored locally on your device. The security of your data depends on your device. We recommend regular backups. Content is not stored on servers or in the cloud.
Liability: The developer is not liable for data loss, damages, or other disadvantages, except in cases of gross negligence or intent.
Changes: App features may be modified or removed at any time. Potential impacts on your data will be communicated to the best of our knowledge.
Rights: All rights to the app remain with the developer. Your diary content belongs to you and can be exported or backed up. Copying or sharing the app itself is not allowed.
Termination: Deleting the app will remove all locally stored data. Make backups if you want to keep your content.
Contact & Legal: For questions or legal matters, please contact: contact.oneminutediary@gmail.com

boolEnumNumber.overviewDescription: This analyzes whether {{labelA}} is associated with {{labelB}}.
boolEnumNumber.hypothesisBooleanIncrease: Occurrence of {{labelA}} is likely to increase {{labelB}}.
boolEnumNumber.hypothesisBooleanDecrease: Occurrence of {{labelA}} is likely to decrease {{labelB}}.
boolEnumNumber.hypothesisBooleanUnclear: An effect of {{labelA}} on {{labelB}} is possible, but the probability is low.
boolEnumNumber.hypothesisEnumHigh: Higher levels of {{labelA}} are likely associated with higher {{labelB}} values.
boolEnumNumber.hypothesisEnumLow: Higher levels of {{labelA}} are likely associated with lower {{labelB}} values.
boolEnumNumber.hypothesisEnumUnclear: A relationship between {{labelA}} and {{labelB}} is possible, but not clearly detectable.

enumEnum.errorInvalidData: Invalid data ‚Äì please check the input.
enumEnum.noRelationShip: There is no clear relationship between {{labelA}} and {{labelB}}.
enumEnum.relationship: There is a {{strength}} {{effect}} relationship between {{labelA}} and {{labelB}}.
enumEnum.addMoreData: Add more entries to draw a conclusion.
enumEnum.mayBeWeakCorrelation: There is a small possibility that an {{inDe}} of {{labelA}} is associated with a {{dirB}} in {{labelB}}.
enumEnum.mayBeWeakCorrelationRecommendation: Gather more data before making decisions based on the weak relationship between {{labelA}} and {{labelB}}.
enumEnum.moderateCorrelation: Therefore, an {{inDe}} of {{labelA}} tends to be associated with a {{dirB}} in {{labelB}}.
enumEnum.moderateCorrelationRecommendation: Increase {{labelA}} to achieve a moderate {{dirB}} in {{labelB}}.
enumEnum.strongCorrelation: An {{inDe}} of {{labelA}} is strongly associated with a {{dirB}} in {{labelB}}.
enumEnum.veryStrongCorrelation: An {{inDe}} of {{labelA}} is very strongly associated with a {{dirB}} in {{labelB}}.
enumEnum.veryStrongCorrelationRecommendation: Prioritize changes in {{labelA}} to reliably achieve a significant {{dirB}} in {{labelB}}.
enumEnum.noRelationShipBool: There is no clear relationship between {{labelEnum}} and the occurrence of {{labelBool}}.
enumEnum.mayBeWeakCorrelationBool: A higher {{labelEnum}} is weakly associated with a {{dirProb}} in the probability of {{labelBool}}.
enumEnum.mayBeWeakCorrelationRecommendationBool: Gather more data before making decisions based on this weak relationship.
enumEnum.moderateCorrelationBool: An {{inDe}} of {{labelEnum}} is moderately associated with a {{dirProb}} in the probability of {{labelBool}}.
enumEnum.moderateCorrelationRecommendationBool: Increase {{labelEnum}} to achieve a moderate {{dirProb}} in the probability of {{labelBool}}.
enumEnum.strongCorrelationBool: An {{inDe}} of {{labelEnum}} is strongly associated with a {{dirProb}} in the probability of {{labelBool}}.
enumEnum.strongCorrelationRecommendationBool: Adjust {{labelEnum}} to strongly influence the probability of {{labelBool}}.
enumEnum.veryStrongCorrelationBool: An {{inDe}} of {{labelEnum}} is very strongly associated with a {{dirProb}} in the probability of {{labelBool}}.
enumEnum.veryStrongCorrelationRecommendationBool: Prioritize changes in {{labelEnum}} to reliably achieve a significant {{dirProb}} in the probability of {{labelBool}}.
enumEnum.notEnoughData: Add more entries to draw a conclusion.
enumEnum.outliersWarning: ‚ö†Ô∏è Caution: The data contains outliers ‚Äì results should be interpreted carefully.

numberNumber.hypothesisNone: There is no clear relationship between your entries for {{labelA}} and {{labelB}}.
numberNumber.hypothesisVeryWeakPositive: There is only a very weak correlation between your values of {{labelA}} and {{labelB}}.
numberNumber.hypothesisWeakPositive: When your {{labelA}} increases slightly, it is likely that your {{labelB}} also increases a little.
numberNumber.hypothesisModeratePositive: When your {{labelA}} increases, your {{labelB}} usually increases too ‚Äì a moderate positive correlation is visible.
numberNumber.hypothesisStrongPositive: There is a strong positive correlation: when your {{labelA}} increases, it is very likely that your {{labelB}} increases as well.
numberNumber.hypothesisWeakNegative: When your {{labelA}} increases, your {{labelB}} decreases slightly ‚Äì a weak negative correlation is visible.
numberNumber.hypothesisModerateNegative: When your {{labelA}} increases, your {{labelB}} usually decreases ‚Äì a moderate negative correlation is visible.
numberNumber.hypothesisStrongNegative: There is a strong negative correlation: when your {{labelA}} increases, it is very likely that your {{labelB}} decreases.
numberNumber.selectedDescription: When the variable {{labelA}} is {{scale}}, the variable {{labelB}} has on average the value {{value}}.
numberNumber.selectedNone: No data point has been selected yet.

boolNumber.hypothesisStrongPositive: A strong positive relationship between {{labelA}} and {{labelB}}.
boolNumber.hypothesisModeratePositive: A moderate positive relationship between {{labelA}} and {{labelB}}.
boolNumber.hypothesisWeakPositive: A weak positive relationship between {{labelA}} and {{labelB}}.
boolNumber.hypothesisStrongNegative: A strong negative relationship between {{labelA}} and {{labelB}}.
boolNumber.hypothesisModerateNegative: A moderate negative relationship between {{labelA}} and {{labelB}}.
boolNumber.hypothesisWeakNegative: A weak negative relationship between {{labelA}} and {{labelB}}.
boolNumber.noClearCorrelation: There is currently no clear linear relationship between {{labelA}} and {{labelB}}. Collect more data to make a more reliable statement.
boolNumber.trendPositive: An increase in {{labelA}}directly leads to an increase in {{labelB}}.
boolNumber.trendNegative: An increase in {{labelA}}directly leads to a decrease in {{labelB}}.

boolBool.errorInvalidData: Invalid data: Arrays must be the same length.
boolBool.selectedDescription: The case where {{labelA}} is {{fieldA}} and {{labelB}} is {{fieldB}} occurs in {{percent}}% of cases.
boolBool.recommendationIncrease: If you do {{labelA}}, the likelihood of {{labelB}} increases by {{diffPercent}}%.
boolBool.recommendationDecrease: If you do {{labelA}}, the likelihood of {{labelB}} decreases by {{diffPercent}}%.
